originalText.text: I worked there during COVID in 2020. The people cared for the patients well. It looks foreboding on the outside, but, the folks on the inside are treated well by the doctors and staff and nurses.

text.text: I worked there during COVID in 2020. The people cared for the patients well. It looks foreboding on the outside, but, the folks on the inside are treated well by the doctors and staff and nurses.

originalText.text: Uh Oh. If you really need to know what a Forensic  Psychiatric Center is.. well it's a place they put people who have been deemed "criminally insane". An extremely depressing and foreboding place. If you try to visit, they won't let you. So don't try. On a brighter note, there are way fewer people in here than there used to be.

originalText.text: I used to live on the island. I would see people go in. It looks like a clean facility. There's a state police barracks next door
